channel.description: Recent content in 英文原著：小王子 on Yuanzx Blog

item.title: The Little Prince - Chapter 1
item.description: Once when I was six years old I saw a magnificent picture in a book, called True Stories from Nature, about the primeval forest. It was a picture of a boa constrictor in the act of swallowing an animal. Here is a copy of the drawing. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 词汇： 1. magnificent adj. 华丽的 2. primeval adj. 原始的 3. boa
